text: Michael Howard Bushby (29 July 1931 – 8 February 2020) was an English cricketer. He played 43 first-class matches for Cambridge University Cricket Club between 1952 and 1954. An opening batsman, Mike Bushby captained Cambridge University in 1954.Wisden 1955, p. 607. His highest score was 113 against Lancashire in 1954. ==See also== * List of Cambridge University Cricket Club players ==References== ==External links== * Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English cricketers Category:People educated at Dulwich College Category:Alumni of Queens' College, Cambridge Category:Cambridge University cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Macclesfield Category:Marylebone Cricket Club cricketers
title: Michael Bushby
